subject: Re: Etch on a Thinkpad T23
body:
On Fri, May 04, 2007 at 10:59:27PM EDT, Jonathan Yavner wrote:
> > Suggestion: add that website to the list on
> > http://www.linux-laptop.net/ and http://tuxmobil.org 
> 
> Submitted to both!  But I never got an answer from l-l.net for my notes 
> on the ThinkPad 600E:
>     http://home.comcast.net/~jyavner/TP600E/
> 
> 
> > Most people will no doubt look on those sites before searching this
> > mailing list. 
> 
> Yes.  Really the question I am asking on this list is, "Why doesn't 
> anybody sell pre-tuned Linux install disks for specific laptop models?  
> Would you ever buy (have bought) such a thing?"
> 
> I bought my 600E from http://LinuxCertified.com  It worked out of the 
> box!  But their T22-with-Ubuntu is twice the price of the T23 I bought 
> sans OS.  Is it really worth $200 to have somebody else install/tune 
> Linux for you?  What if I just sold a DVD without the hardware?

Hmm.. I don't know you.

How will I know your install disk is not full of worms?

Thanks,
cga



--
